summary: This bill, the Veterans Affairs Distributed Ledger Innovation Act of 2025, directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to study the feasibility of using distributed ledger technology (DLT) to improve claims adjudication, reduce fraud, and enhance data security within the VA. The study will examine potential benefits and risks, consult with experts and stakeholders, and provide recommendations for pilot programs and legislative actions. The bill defines DLT and outlines the study's components, including a detailed report to Congress within a year of enactment.
